metadata.title: USN-4125-1 -- Memcached vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Memcached incorrectly handled certain UNIX sockets. An attacker could possibly use this issue to access sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4125-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  memcached - 1.4.25-2ubuntu1.5 No subscription required
